title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 82-1.9 - Demand for public hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 82-1.9 - Demand for public hearing

State Regulations

Unless the employee notifies the hearing officer at least
24 hours before the first day of the hearing that he or she demands a public
hearing, the hearing shall be private. The prehearing conference shall be
private. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
82-1.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
